text: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahīna nti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi
edit: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahīna nti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, vision, insight, wisdom, knowledge, [and] light arose to me in the teaching never heard before thus, "That origin of suffering as a noble truth had been abandoned [by me]."
